extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     PSYC235 or PSYC251 or PSYC271 or PSYC370

basic.description: An overview of typical sexual behaviour and its variations. Topics include the history of sex research, the sexual response cycle, sexual dysfunction, gender identity, and sexual orientation. Particular attention will be paid to current issues in sex research and theory.
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Human Sexuality
